languages.text: "Пустотные крысы выгрызли их, пока я спал. А воды сточных труб, которыми омыли мои раны, оказались заражены. Боль превратилась в нескончаемое жжение... И стало лишь хуже".

"The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."
languages.original_text: "Пустотные крысы выгрызли их, пока я спал. А воды сточных труб, которыми омыли мои раны, оказались заражены. Боль превратилась в нескончаемое жжение... И стало лишь хуже".

traits.locale_text: "The void rats gnawed them away while I was sleeping. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with turned out to be infected. The pain turned into a stinging that wouldn't go away... It only made things worse."

"The void rats gnawed them away while I was sleeping. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with turned out to be infected. The pain turned into a stinging that wouldn't go away... It only made things worse."

"The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."

"The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."

languages.text: «Las ratas del vacío se los comieron mientras dormía. Y el agua de cloaca con la que lavé mis heridas estaba infectada, al parecer. El dolor se convirtió en una sensación punzante que nunca desaparecía... y solo empeoró».
languages.original_text: "The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."

traits.locale_text: «Las ratas del vacío se los comieron mientras dormía. Y el agua de cloaca con la que lavé mis heridas estaba infectada, al parecer. El dolor se convirtió en una sensación punzante que nunca desaparecía... y solo empeoró».

languages.text: 「寝ている間にヴォイドラットにかじられました。そして傷を洗った下水道の水が汚染されていた。痛みは刺すようなものになり、消え去りはしない…そして悪化する一方でした」
languages.original_text: "The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."

traits.locale_text: 「寝ている間にヴォイドラットにかじられました。そして傷を洗った下水道の水が汚染されていた。痛みは刺すようなものになり、消え去りはしない…そして悪化する一方でした」

languages.text: “我睡着的时候，虚空老鼠吃掉了我的眼睛。我用下水道的水清洗伤口，没想到水已经被感染了，原本的疼痛变成了无法消失的刺痛……结果，一切都变得更糟了。”
languages.original_text: "The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."

traits.locale_text: “我睡着的时候，虚空老鼠吃掉了我的眼睛。我用下水道的水清洗伤口，没想到水已经被感染了，原本的疼痛变成了无法消失的刺痛……结果，一切都变得更糟了。”

languages.text: "Die Leerenratten haben sie weggenagt, während ich geschlafen habe. Und das Wasser, mit dem meine Wunden gereinigt wurden, erwies sich als infiziert. Der Schmerz wurde zu einem Stechen, das nie mehr wegging ... sondern nur schlimmer wurde."
languages.original_text: "The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."

traits.locale_text: "Die Leerenratten haben sie weggenagt, während ich geschlafen habe. Und das Wasser, mit dem meine Wunden gereinigt wurden, erwies sich als infiziert. Der Schmerz wurde zu einem Stechen, das nie mehr wegging ... sondern nur schlimmer wurde."

languages.text: « Les rats du vide les ont grignotés pendant mon sommeil, et l'eau des égouts qui a servi à laver mes plaies s'est avérée infectée. Depuis, je n'ai jamais réussi à me débarrasser de la douleur... qui n'a fait qu'empirer. »
languages.original_text: "The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."

traits.locale_text: « Les rats du vide les ont grignotés pendant mon sommeil, et l'eau des égouts qui a servi à laver mes plaies s'est avérée infectée. Depuis, je n'ai jamais réussi à me débarrasser de la douleur... qui n'a fait qu'empirer. »

languages.text: "Uçsuz sıçanları, ben uyurken gözlerimi kemirmiş. Yaralarımı yıkadığım kanalizasyon suyu da meğerse kirliymiş. Acı, artık sürekli batma hissine dönüştü. Geçmek bilmiyor ve... Daha da kötüye gidiyor."
languages.original_text: "The void rats gnawed them out while I was asleep. And the sewer water my wounds were washed with was infected, turns out. The pain became a stinging feeling that wouldn't go away... And only got worse."
